job_details.job_description: Azure, GCP (deep knowledge of core services). Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible. Containers & Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes (EKS/AKS/GKE). Automation & DevOps: CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), scripting (Python, Bash). Networking & Security: VPC, IAM, encryption, Zero Trust. Monitoring & Logging: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, Cloud-native tools. Cost Optimization: FinOps, governance, budgeting. High Availability & DR: Multi-r
